Please upload the proof of address. 1.Acceptable proof of address documents should include your name and address in detail,such as vaild water,electricity and gas bills dated within the latest three months,credit card bills,the certificates issued by government agencies or the judiciary and etc; 2.ID card,household register,passport,driving licence,social security card and courier receipt are not accepted as proof of address; 3.The information such as the date and address on the address proof are not accepted hand written; 4.The picture of address proof should be clearly visible(watermark is accepted).
